install.heroSubtitle: Install the app for offline access, push notifications, and faster loading
install.platformGuideDesc: Follow the steps for your device
install.androidStep1: Tap the menu icon (â‹®) in Chrome
install.androidStep1Desc: Located in the top-right corner of your browser
install.androidStep2: Select 'Install app' or 'Add to Home screen'
install.androidStep2Desc: You may need to scroll down in the menu
install.androidStep3Desc: The app will be added to your home screen
install.iosStep1Desc: The square icon with an arrow at the bottom of Safari
install.iosStep2: Scroll down and tap 'Add to Home Screen'
install.iosStep2Desc: You may need to scroll right in the action row
install.iosStep3: Tap 'Add' in the top right corner
install.iosStep3Desc: The app icon will appear on your home screen
install.desktopStep1: Look for the install icon in the address bar
install.desktopStep1Desc: A small icon will appear on the right side (Chrome/Edge)
install.desktopStep2Desc: The app will open in its own window
install.shareDescription: Scan the QR code or copy the link to share
install.troubleshoot1Text: Try using Chrome, Edge, or Safari. Clear your browser cache and reload the page. Make sure you're not in private/incognito mode.
install.troubleshoot2Text: Close and reopen the app completely. On mobile, swipe the app away from recent apps and reopen it. You may also check for updates in your browser settings.
install.troubleshoot3Text: Ensure you visited the main pages while online to cache the data. Some features require an initial online session to download necessary files.
install.alreadyInstalledText: This app is already installed on your device.

home.noContactAssigned: No HSSE contact assigned to your location

platformSettings.durationHint: How long the splash screen is shown (2-6 seconds)
platformSettings.subtitle: Subtitle

severity.title: Severity Rating (HSSE)
severity.ratingDescription: Choose the highest credible impact across People / Environment / Asset / Business / Reputation-Security
severity.erpActivatedDescription: Was the Emergency Response Plan activated for this event?

level_1.label: Level 1 - Low
level_1.examples: First aid only, very small spill contained, minor damage, no business disruption

level_2.label: Level 2 - Moderate
level_2.description: Medical treatment possible or minor restricted work
level_2.examples: Contained spill requiring cleanup team, moderate damage, short disruption

level_3.label: Level 3 - Serious
level_3.description: Medical Treatment Case or Restricted Work
level_3.examples: Moderate spill/emission, significant property damage, noticeable operational disruption

level_4.label: Level 4 - Major
level_4.description: Lost Time Injury (LTI/LWDC) or major fire/LOPC
level_4.examples: Major environmental impact, major asset loss, shutdown, regulator notification likely

level_5.label: Level 5 - Catastrophic
level_5.examples: Major offsite impact, extreme security event, crisis management activation

level1.label: Level 1 - Low
level1.examples: First aid only, very small spill contained, minor damage, no business disruption

level2.label: Level 2 - Moderate
level2.description: Medical treatment possible or minor restricted work
level2.examples: Contained spill requiring cleanup team, moderate damage, short disruption

level3.label: Level 3 - Serious
level3.description: Medical Treatment Case or Restricted Work
level3.examples: Moderate spill/emission, significant property damage, noticeable operational disruption

level4.label: Level 4 - Major
level4.description: Lost Time Injury (LTI/LWDC) or major fire/LOPC
level4.examples: Major environmental impact, major asset loss, shutdown, regulator notification likely

level5.label: Level 5 - Catastrophic
level5.examples: Major offsite impact, extreme security event, crisis management activation

validation.erpMinimum: ERP activated events cannot be less than Level 4 without documented override reason
validation.ltiMinimum: LTI/LWDC events must be at least Level 4

severity.overrideRequired: To proceed with a lower severity, you must provide an override reason below.
severity.overrideReasonPlaceholder: Document why this event is below the standard minimum severity...
severity.overrideAuditWarning: This override will be logged for audit purposes

hsseValidation.level34Info: After validation, observation will auto-close when all corrective actions are verified.

closureGate.managerClosureDescription: Level 5 observations require HSSE Manager approval to close

notificationMatrix.resetSuccessDesc: Notification matrix has been reset to default values
notificationMatrix.confirmResetDesc: This will remove all custom notification rules and restore the default matrix. This action cannot be undone.
notificationMatrix.confirmDeleteDesc: This will permanently remove this notification rule.
notificationMatrix.ruleAddedDesc: Notification rule has been added successfully
notificationMatrix.noRulesDesc: Add rules to define who gets notified for each event severity level
notificationMatrix.conditionHelp: Conditions filter when notifications are sent

quickObservation.title: Quick Observation
quickObservation.subtitle: Report unsafe conditions or behaviors quickly
quickObservation.selectEventType: What would you like to report?
quickObservation.selectEventTypeDescription: Choose the type of event you want to report
quickObservation.observationDescription: Report unsafe acts, conditions, or positive safety practices
quickObservation.incidentDescription: Report actual events involving injury, damage, or loss
quickObservation.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the unsafe condition or behavior you noticed...
quickObservation.closedOnSpotDescription: I have already addressed this hazard
quickObservation.analysisComplete: AI has suggested type and risk level
quickObservation.canSubmitWithoutLocation: You can still submit without location

ai.confirmTranslationRequired: Please confirm the translation to continue.
ai.clarityLow: Input not clear enough for analysis. Please provide more specific details.
ai.minWords: Please enter at least 10 words for meaningful analysis.
ai.validationFailed: Input validation failed. Please improve your description.
ai.reviewSelections: Review the AI selections and confirm to continue
ai.rateLimitError: Rate limit exceeded. Please wait and try again.
ai.creditsError: AI credits exhausted. Please contact administrator.

hsseValidationDashboard.title: HSSE Validation Dashboard
hsseValidationDashboard.subtitle: Pending validation tasks for HSSE Experts

hsseValidation.title: HSSE Expert Validation
hsseValidation.description: Review risk assessment and proposed actions
hsseValidation.level34Info: This observation is Level 3-4 severity and requires your validation.
hsseValidation.level5Warning: Warning: Level 5 severity - requires HSSE Manager approval for closure.

finalClosure.title: Final Closure (Level 5)
finalClosure.description: As HSSE Manager, you can perform final closure
finalClosure.managerOnlyWarning: Only HSSE Manager can close Level 5 observations.
finalClosure.actionsNotComplete: Cannot close: There are still pending actions.
finalClosure.validationRequired: Cannot close: HSSE Expert validation is required.

location.geofenceRadiusDescription: Alert trigger zone around the location

activity.name: Activity Name
activity.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the work activities, equipment, duration...

hazard.atLeastOne: At least one hazard is required

controls.hierarchy: Apply controls in order: Elimination - Substitution - Engineering - Administrative - PPE

team.requirement: Risk assessments must be conducted by a competent team including supervisor, safety rep, and worker representative.
team.minimum: At least 2 team members are required
team.signatureNote: By signing, I confirm participation in this risk assessment

project.linkDescription: Associate this assessment with a contractor project

compliance.workEnvironmentPlaceholder: e.g., Outdoor, confined space, elevated work, chemical exposure area...
compliance.scopePlaceholder: Define what is included/excluded from this assessment. Consider equipment, processes, areas, and timeframes...
compliance.scopeHelp: ISO 45001 requires clear definition of assessment scope and boundaries.
compliance.legislationHelp: Select all applicable legislation and standards that apply to this activity.
compliance.hierarchyJustification: Why can't higher-level controls be applied?
compliance.hierarchyJustificationPlaceholder: Explain why elimination, substitution, or engineering controls are not feasible...

consultation.title: Worker Consultation (ISO 45001 7.4)
consultation.requirement: ISO 45001 requires consultation with workers on OH&S matters. Document evidence of worker participation.
consultation.notesPlaceholder: Document the consultation process, key concerns raised by workers, and how they were addressed...
consultation.help: Include details of toolbox talks, safety meetings, or individual consultations. Record worker suggestions and how they were incorporated.

acceptability.title: Risk Acceptability Decision (ISO 45001)
acceptability.acceptableDesc: Risk is at an acceptable level. Proceed with standard monitoring.
acceptability.tolerable_alarpDesc: Risk is As Low As Reasonably Practicable. Proceed with enhanced monitoring.
acceptability.unacceptableDesc: Risk is too high. STOP work and implement additional controls.
acceptability.unacceptableWarning: Work cannot proceed with unacceptable risk level. Additional controls must be implemented before work begins.
acceptability.justificationPlaceholder: Explain why further risk reduction is not reasonably practicable...
acceptability.justificationHelp: Document the cost-benefit analysis demonstrating that further risk reduction would be grossly disproportionate to the benefits gained.
acceptability.managementApproval: This assessment requires management approval due to high/critical risk level.

review.title: Review Schedule (ISO 45001)
review.help: ISO 45001 requires periodic review of risk assessments. Review frequency should reflect the level of risk and potential for change.

scanner.pointAtCode: Point camera at the QR code or barcode
scanner.cameraPermissionDesc: Please allow camera access in your browser settings to scan codes
scanner.alignCode: Align QR code within the frame
